channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2022-2099|2024-08-03T00:24:44.425Z -- unknown -- woocommerce
item.description: The WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 6.6.0 is vulnerable to stored HTML injection due to lack of escaping and sanitizing in the payment gateway titles

item.title: CVE-2024-1310|2024-07-09T16:26:32.494Z -- unknown -- woocommerce
item.description: The WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 8.6 does not prevent users with at least the contributor role from leaking products they shouldn't have access to. (e.g. private, draft and trashed products)

item.title: CVE-2024-1310|2024-04-15T05:00:03.811Z -- unknown -- woocommerce
item.description: The WooCommerce WordPress plugin before 8.6 does not prevent users with at least the contributor role from leaking products they shouldn't have access to. (e.g. private, draft and trashed products)
